title: ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set,includes 1 Pack 8 OZ Mini Stubby Claw Hammer and 1 Pack 16 OZ Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer,Soft Nonslip Handle & Heat Treated Head,Heavier for Higher Hardness
descriptions:
Meet the ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set — simple, sturdy, and easy to use.

What you get:
- Small Hammer (8 oz): Short and light. Great for quick fixes, tight spaces, or lighter jobs.
- Regular Hammer (16 oz): Your everyday hammer. Good for most tasks around the house.

Easy on the hands:
- Soft, non-slip rubber handles with a gentle, comfortable shape. Easy to hold, even if your grip isn’t strong.
- Fiberglass inside the handle helps reduce shaking and sting when you strike.

Strong and safe:
- Hammer heads are made of tough steel and heat-treated for long life.
- Polished finish with a clear coating to help prevent rust.

Works well for:
- Driving nails in.
- Pulling nails out. The curved claw gives strong leverage, so you don’t have to use as much force.

Simple to handle and store:
- Well-balanced so it feels steady in your hand.
- Hang hole at the end of each handle for easy storage on a hook.

Why you’ll like it:
- Two sizes for different jobs.
- Comfortable grip that won’t slip.
- Built to last, with less vibration and more control.

ZUZUAN makes home fixes easier, whether you’re hanging a picture or repairing a loose board. Pick it up, and it just feels right in your hand.
